short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the AIR (Ignore) Percentage for tweets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the AIR Percentage extension for Twitter! With this extension, you can easily see how much a Tweet has been AIRed.

Simply install the extension and the AIR percentage will be displayed alongside each tweet.

This is a great tool for seeing how much attention a tweet is getting, and can help you identify which tweets are being ignored or overlooked.

Try it out now and see the power of AIR Percentage in action!

Got an idea for a feature or issues using the extension? Visit
https://github.com/haideralipunjabi/air-for-twitter
